body.description: Beautiful stationery is a pleasure to use Versatile design is suitable for a variety of occasions Keep a box on hand for whenever a handwritten letter is warranted. Sheet size (5-3/4” wide x 7-3/4” high) allows you to write expansively. Exceptional value Premium boxed set features crisp, smooth-finish sheets and stationery envelopes constructed of quality paper. Stationery set comes in an attractive box suitable for gift-giving. Brighten their day Nothing is more personal than a handwritten letter. Stay in touch!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Fuchsia Blooms Boxed Stationery Sheets Enjoy the fine art of letter writing with designer stationery sheets and matching envelopes

Add flair to your personal correspondence Beautiful design Crisp letter sheets feature an array of multi-hued flowers in the lower left-hand corner. Gloss highlights and touches of silver foil add flourish. Board box with clear acetate lid contains 30 letter sheets and 24 matching envelopes. Superior stationery sheets Write with confidence. Substantial smooth-finish writing sheets take a variety of pens beautifully. Fountain pens glide over the page. 24 matching envelopes Gorgeous fuchsia-colored envelopes. Stationery envelopes are constructed of quality paper.

Beautiful stationery is a pleasure to use Versatile design is suitable for a variety of occasions Keep a box on hand for whenever a handwritten letter is warranted. Sheet size (5-3/4” wide x 7-3/4” high) allows you to write expansively. Exceptional value Premium boxed set features crisp, smooth-finish sheets and stationery envelopes constructed of quality paper. Stationery set comes in an attractive box suitable for gift-giving. Brighten their day Nothing is more personal than a handwritten letter. Stay in touch! About our Fuchsia Blooms Letter-Perfect Stationery Sheets: Set comes with 30 designer letter sheets Includes 24 matching stationery envelopes Each sheet measures 5-3/4” wide x 7-3/4” high Stationery set comes in a sturdy matching box with a clear acetate lid
Fuchsia Blooms Journal Fuchsia Blooms Address Book Fuchsia Blooms Thank You Notes Fuchsia Blooms Beaded Bookmark

Our Company History In 1928, at the age of twenty-two, Peter Beilenson began printing books on a small press in the basement of his parents’ home in Larchmont, New York. Peter—and later, his wife, Edna—sought to create fine books that sold at prices even a pauper could afford. Today, still family owned and operated, Peter Pauper Press continues to honor our founders’ legacy—and our customers’ expectations—of beauty, quality, and value. Image: Peter Pauper Press headquarters, circa 1948.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great stationery set!.
reviews.reviewText: I've been buying stationery sets from Peter Pauper Press for many months now and love the various designs, having bought several of them. I rotate amongst my 4 favorites, this being one of them. The paper is a good size and the sets come with coordinating envelopes. My only negative comment is that there is not enough paper for my type of letter writing. Each set comes with 30 sheets of paper and 24 envelopes. I typically use between 3-5 sheets for each daily letter so I am accumulating quite a surplus of envelopes. Wish it were possible to buy the paper alone on occasion to allow me to use up some of them. The boxes that the sets come in are great, too. I keep them when the paper is gone and have made a holder (similar to a small dresser) where the boxes serve as "drawers" to keep pens, stamps, etc. organized.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2015
reviews.reviewText: If you are looking for stationery and have seen the Fuchsia Blooms Set you will not be disappointed! It is absolutely beautiful. The mottled blue page with bright silvered lined flowers in the corner is full of delicate, feminine expression. The thickness of the paper is perfect as well-- no fear of the ink making ugly marks on the back side of the page. I am a stationery hound and out of all of the sets I have ever had, received, and seen, I am surely most happy with this one. I will be back for more because this family owned business knows how to please!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This stationary is very sweet and delicate
reviews.reviewText: This stationary is very sweet and delicate. The paper itself is high quality, with some metallic detailing on the flowers. Each sheet is colored on the front and plain white on the back. I really like the purple envelopes that are included. I wrote thank you notes with this stationary and have received many compliments.My only sad note is that I have none left. I would like to order more from this seller, as the item arrived on time and was even better than I expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Stationary, Questionable Packaging
reviews.reviewText: Both the paper and envelopes are beautiful and appear to be of fine quality. The product itself receives 5 stars from me, and I greatly look forward to writing handwritten letters on this stationary.My item was ordered new (directly from Pauper Press) from the "other sellers" list, but the hard box that contains the stationary had one damaged corner (pictured) and two corners that did not appear new (slightly ripped/torn edges). Additionally, the plastic cover over the open faced, hard box was held in place by scotch tape (pictured), and one side had already been opened (pictured).I don't question that the item was new; inside the box were all 30 sheets of stationary and 24 envelopes in perfect condition. But although the package seemed sturdy and undamaged, the box within that contains the stationary was not in new condition.I have always loved the excellent quality of the products I receive from Peter Pauper Press and this stationary is no exception. My only disappointment is the condition of its box, but as that will only be used for storing the stationary, it isn't a major concern to me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful! Makes a statement in its own!
reviews.reviewText: Thank you. I love this paper..and works well with my fountain pen. The color and design are outstanding!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty and High Quality!
reviews.reviewText: The paper is high quality, an appropriate weight, and has tasteful metallic details in the print. The envelopes fit the paper, but do not fit 4"x6" pictures. So pretty and perfect for writing letters to my family!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2016
reviews.reviewText: This paper is perfect for those of us that like to use a fountain pen. It's really a shame that letter writing is becoming a dying art with paper like this on the market. The flower design is nice. Actually I bought stationary paper from this same seller only a different design. Will be buying more as it good when wanting to use a fountain pen. Quality at a very nice price. The envelopes compliment t the paper nicely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and Simple
reviews.reviewText: Fabulous stationery! The envelopes and paper may be a bit too small for my liking but I two pages will suffice for any outgoing letter. Definetly will buy from Peter Pauper!
These are great!!! I gave them to my grandma as a gift since she loves writing letters.She really likes it! The design is cute & she loves the envelopes it comes with.
This is beautiful writing paper… the best I have ever purchased.I would buy it again.🙂

This colourful box of stationery comes with light plastic wrap, enclosing the package. This assured me that my order was clean and new! It has been so long, since I have seen 🙂 pretty writing paper! I look forward to my 'overseas' correspondence.
Bought these and another brand of boxed stationery and my mother absolutely loves this brand better. She said it’s so much prettier.

reviews.reviewTitle: Affordable, Elegant and High Quality Stationary
reviews.reviewText: This stationery is no joke. It is beautifully designed, the paper is high quality, and it is packaged in a very organized way. The price is easily $4-$5 cheaper than stationery kits of the same quality and amount here in Vancouver, Canada. Definitely worth the money!
